msbt.message: Whoa-whoa-whoa! What's up with your face? Did you get stung by a wasp? Does it hurt? You OK?Yeah, they can be mean sometimes. Or, uhall times. Gotta be careful around 'em, y'know?Um Well, it's kinda too late to be careful NOW, but you know what I mean, .

Waah! Why's your face all gnarly? Were you in a fight? Who was it? Where are they?!Oh! A wasp stung you! Bwa ha ha!Well, that's a cinch! You just gotta dab a bit of medicine on the stings. That'll fix you right up!

Wow! Is your face OK? It's SUPER creepy. Looks like some kind of Halloween mask!Hang on. You didn't worry the wasps, did you? Those little buzzy-bodies just LOVE to go off, .If you don't touch the stings, they'll heal eventually. Or if you wanna speed things along, use medicine!
Um You know your face is all swollen, right? Was it wasps? I bet it was wasps.I've got some medicine if you want it. Just, y'know, run faster next time!

I'm just giving you a hard time. I used to mess with wasp nests as a kid, so that's happened to me a lot.Eventually Mom wouldn't even let me go outside unless she knew I had some medicine handy.Of all the weird habits for me to hang on to,

Whoa-whoa-whoa! What's up with your face? Did you get stung by a wasp? Does it hurt? You OK?Yeah, they can be mean sometimes. Or, uhall times. Gotta be careful around 'em, y'know?Um Well, it's kinda too late to be careful NOW, but you know what I mean, .
I bet that does hurt, though. If I had medicine with me, I'd give it to you.But tell you what, I'll show you how to MAKE medicine. My mom taught me when I was little.
Just get all the stuff for the recipe together and you can whip up some medicine in no time. Good luck!
